title: Minibus Day Trip in London  An ideal way to get around the city
text:
9, 2015 
For those who have visited London, a minibus day trip around the city has been one of the most exciting and unforgettable journey that they have ever done. 
Although there are several options available today to tour London, a minibus journey offers a unique experience in itself. Unique because not only is the journey on the minibus comfortable and enjoyable, it is also inexpensive. Typically the vehicles that are put into service for providing minibus day trip are luxurious minibuses that are loaded with amenities. They usually come in different sizes – from 14-Seater minibuses to 57-Seater minibuses. The minibuses are equipped with microphones, CD/ DVD players, interior lighting and large full size windows that provide a panoramic view of the outside. The minibuses are centrally heated as well as air-conditioned and this ensures that passengers have a comfortable journey no matter during which time of the year they are travelling in.A minibus day trip in London is ideal when the group size is between 18- 20 people. Minibuses for a day trip can be hired from reputed coach hire companies and usually the booking is done over the phone. For a minibus day trip that is going to be focused mostly on sight-seeing, it is best to start the day early. If the group is staying together in a hotel then the minibus come to the hotel for the pick-up at the scheduled time. A professional and qualified tourist guide can be hired to provide the group with information and details of the most popular tourist places. Usually tourist guides are not required anymore as people are able to gather information on tourist spots on their laptops or mobile devices. Usually, the group is already aware of the tourist places that are of importance and so is able to instruct the bus driver of the minibus day trip itinerary. In this way the group enjoys freedom to decide on the places that need to be visited and the time that will be spent at each place. In this way a minibus day trip offers flexibility and enjoyment to travelers.Some of the important tourist destinations in London are Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament, Westminster, London Eye, Buckingham Palace, Hyde Park, Thames River, 10 Downing Street, Fleet Street, Trafalgar Square, Piccadilly Circus and Mayfair. As each place has its own unique importance and place in History, one must remember to always carry a camera to capture those precious moments that can be stored in the camera and viewed later on.A minibus day trip costs a few hundred pounds but spreading this cost over 18-20 travelers means that the per-head cost of travelling is quite low and this is really the beauty and value in hiring a minibus. Group travelers enjoy travelling in minibus as they are also able to interact with each other closely in the minibus and interact with each other freely and easily. Combined with the flexibility of timings, a minibus day trip is the most advisable way to get around in London. Source:   ABOUT THE AUTHOR
